comments.content: This is my first font, so I thought I would post it up here and see what everyone thought. Thanks!
it is soooo tiny. these old eyes can't handle it. bigger? just for crit?

Josh - it's a good start, but you'll want to standardize your x-height if you want this thing to be readable when setting text.   
   
On your next post, set a few sentences in the face so we can see things in context.   
   
jb
